attributes.action: A Public Vote for Leaders In The Police Force In England and North Ireland
attributes.additional_details: My Noble Lords and Ladies have You ever known anything finer than a Good Police Man or Woman,but a bad one is Hell on Earth.The Queen could have better reign with Her People and Its at the discretion of the Government to Make sure people stick to the Oath.If the public could vote It would save the Police Force all going one way,at the moment its a bit like I want You to feel what I feel,also the sacrifice of Soldiers and the hardship they encounter coming back from War with Politics becoming to competitive,and the people that give all their lives to working in Factories and working sleeping to provide for everyone pay tax.Most people have Common sense.With this option the people are not stuck with Vlad in Impaler stuck in Office for the Police and Public If it ever did happen.A Political System must have a back up Procedure as things do not always go to plan.
